So far short sellers have been completely wrong and they have had their accounts blown up :) Where do you think Tesla stock is headed?

links.title: Tesla Model 3 VINs point to over 2,000 units produced in 2017
links.description: By the end of the day tomorrow, Tesla should release its delivery and production results for the fourth quarter and the full year 2017. As we previously reported, we expect record deliveries for the quarter, but Model 3 production remains a wild card and it will be the most important metric for shareholders and industry analysts.
